# APPEL Backend

Node.js + Express + MongoDB backend for APPEL elevator service app.

## Live URL
https://appel-backend.onrender.com

## Endpoints
- POST /api/auth/login
- POST /api/auth/register
- GET /api/elevators
- POST /api/services
- GET /api/repairs
- etc.

See full documentation in [backend/README.md](./backend/README.md)
